title: Ticket #3949: Determine GCE wire protocol
description:
In order to write a Google Compute Engine (GCE) GAHP, we need to determine the wire protocol for the APIs we plan to use. These include the OAuth 2.0 command to refresh an access token and several GCE commands (create instance, query instances, delete instance).

We will use documentation provided by Google and the existing python client tool to do this.
remarks:
2014-Feb-04 10:55:42 by jfrey:
This has been done.
creator: jfrey
